title: OPL finals tickets sold out in 4 mins tonight
body: Well as the title stats they sold out that quickly, i wasn't even fast enough to secure 5 tickets fro me and my mates, seriously i was so fast and yet didn't get it, i timed out the first time i tried dn that was upsetting... but seriously can we get some more seats or something please!!! so many people want to go.. i so badly want to go but there are no more tickets.. may i RIP

replies.body: I feel it man, I was there at the checkout screen for 2 tickets and then it decides to fuck up and I lose my tickets.

max level of pain.
da feels.
why u do dis 2 mi rito

Sorry RLG. We just did not anticipate this demand. We tried to estimate based on players in Sydney and the OPL viewership but you guys just blew all expectations! Please come down to the park and take part in the free community activities and hang out and watch the stream in one of the viewing areas.
Sorry you had issues with the check out process, I am passing this all on to Big Top ticketing so they are aware of the issues.
We need more Gold Coast events :( I was going to fly over to Sydney with a friend but I didn't realize tickets would sell out so fast. {{item:3070}} {{item:2049}}
Nothing in the Gold Coast! Dissapointed
Oh wow really? D: I was still looking for someone to go with me to it... :s
4 minutes!! i seriously wanted it so bad and knew it would be sold quickly but wow this is just nuts

I don't even know anyone irl who likes League as much as I do xD I didn't think it'd be sold out that quick since everyone irl has no idea what it is o . o but wowee that suckssss. Good-bye free skin too :c
thats what i wanted swell, i lie watching them play but i can watch it at home it was the free t shirt and skin :c
I like how we have the same intentions. Depending where you live you can still go to the cinema and they still have the free gift bag apparently :3

dude i live in wollongong (near sydney) and so if they organise a movie screening in sydeny as well to accommodate the people who couldn't get a ticket and they get a show bag that would be wonderful!! riot can you make a cinema screening at hoyts in sydney because I'm pretty sure a lot of people missed out.

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gtXd7pEn,comment-id=000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-05-05T22:39:15.273+0000)
>
> dude i live in wollongong (near sydney) and so if they organise a movie screening in sydeny as well to accommodate the people who couldn't get a ticket and they get a show bag that would be wonderful!! riot can you make a cinema screening at hoyts in sydney because I'm pretty sure a lot of people missed out.

they should totally have a screening at hoyts in wollongong so i can go.

yeah that would be freaking awesome but there isn't many rioters down here so i think one is Sydney would be more convenient and also i think its only one in each state.. but yeah if they did wollongong would be awesome but they will probably just stick with sydney

I live in Vic so getting up there woulda been a lonely hike by myself xD Oh okay, I thought they still woulda had a cinema screening in Sydney for the ones that couln't go to Luna Park too :s that sucks. They made the cinema in Vic like an hour away xD Of course public transport almost doubles that and cbs...
Though I'm still surprised, didn't think it'd sell so quickly like o . o

quickly is a understatement to how fast they were all sold, couldn't believe it, me and my mates were joking around about it but were all pretty serious about it but were all thinking about it, then i check the Boards the next day and there was a news hour saying there is only 100 left and i was kinda sad but determined and blah blah blah.. long story short, no ticket and they all sold out in 4mins.. couldn't believe it.. sigh.. also a quick question to riot, if you do hold a viewing in a hoyts cinema do the people that get a ticket for that get a show bag?

I don't think I would have been able to go anyways, cause no friends liking League :c I can answer that! From what I saw on the site, people who can't make it to Sydney, we get the viewing cinemas and what not and I believe it said our ticket also includes a 'swag bag' with a skin code and more. c: (I wonder who the skin code is for!)
man thats pretty shitty, but that show bag sounds pretty damn snazzy :D i wanna go now
We were taken by surprise, totally. We have learnt a lot and we will make this smoother the next time round.
Hi Shaky, stay tuned on up and coming viewing party news for Sydney.
Guys come on down to the event and take part in the free community activities, don't miss out it will be a blast!
Don't we need a ticket to enter and get the show bag and what not? :o
You don't need a ticket to get into the park and take part in the LoL Community Activities, but unfortunately the show bags are for OPL Final ticket holders only, but there will be prizing and swag.
I might just do a viewing from the cinema where I live xD Will they sell out quickly too? o . o Too much effort to hike up to Sydney anyways ; ^ ;
Got my ticket. Dem good feels. Shame I'm by myself though. Could only secure one. :(
please, not right now, I'm still recovering
Sorry you didn't manage to get a ticket the demand took us by total surprise.
Hi great you got a ticket. There will be plenty of players you can meet and hang out with.
